articles.title: Microsoft’s next big AI bet: building a ‘humanist superintelligence’
articles.summary: Microsoft is forming a new team to research superintelligence and other advanced forms of artificial intelligence.  Mustafa Suleyman, who leads Microsoft’s AI division overseeing Bing and Copilo.
articles.content: Microsoft is forming a new team to research superintelligence and other advanced forms of artificial intelligence. articles.title: Nvidia AI chip ban: Can tech giants navigate a geopolitical zero-sum game?
articles.summary: When Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang initially told the Financial Times that China would “win the AI race” before softening his stance, it crystallised a predicament that’s been ye.
articles.content: When Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang initially told the Financial Times that China would “win the AI race” before softening his stance, it crystallised a predicament that’s been years in the making. The world’s most valuable chipmaker now finds itself caught between two sup

articles.title: Laude Institute announces first batch of ‘Slingshots’ AI grants
articles.summary: Slingshots AI grants provide resources that would be unavailable in most academic settings.  Its debut program has 15 startups focused on AI evaluation.
articles.content: Slingshots AI grants provide resources that would be unavailable in most academic settings. Its debut program has 15 startups focused on AI evaluation.

articles.title: Subtle Computing’s voice isolation models help computers understand you in noisy environments
articles.summary: Subtle Computing has raised $6 million in seed funding to build voice-isolation models.  The startup plans to announce a hardware device next year.

articles.content: Amid pressure to deploy generative and agentic solutions, a familiar question is surfacing: “Is there an AI bubble, and is it about to burst?” For many organisations, this new wave of generative and agentic AI is still very much in experimental stages. articles.author: Ryan Daws

articles.title: Inception raises $50 million to build diffusion models for code and text
articles.summary: Diffusion models already power AI image generators, but Inception thinks they can be even more powerful applied in software development.

articles.title: Google Maps upgrades navigation in India with Gemini, safety alerts
articles.summary: India becomes the second market after the U.  to get Gemini-powered navigation on Google Maps.
articles.content: India becomes the second market after the U.S. to get Gemini-powered navigation on Google Maps.

articles.title: Perplexity to pay Snap $400M to power search in Snapchat
articles.summary: Snap said today that it has signed a deal with AI-powered search engine Perplexity to power a new chatbot.  As part of the deal, Perplexity will pay Snap $400 million in cash and equity.
articles.content: Snap said today that it has signed a deal with AI-powered search engine Perplexity to power a new chatbot. As part of the deal, Perplexity will pay Snap $400 million in cash and equity.
articles.author: Ivan Mehta

articles.title: Apple plans big Siri update with help from Google AI

articles.content: Apple is planning to use a custom version of Google’s Gemini model to support a major upgrade to Siri, according to Bloomberg’s Mark Gurman. articles.title: Pinterest CEO touts open source AI: ‘tremendous performance’ with reduced costs
articles.summary: Pinterest CEO Bill Ready says open source AI is offering cost savings to the company, particularly in visual search.

articles.title: Tinder to use AI to get to know users, tap into their Camera Roll photos
articles.summary: Tinder is testing a feature called Chemistry that will get to know users through questions and, with permission, will access Camera Roll photos on their phones to learn more about their interests and .
articles.content: Tinder is testing a feature called Chemistry that will get to know users through questions and, with permission, will access Camera Roll photos on their phones to learn more about their interests and personality.
articles.author: Sarah Perez

articles.title: Replika founder raises $20M pre-seed for Wabi, the ‘YouTube of apps’
articles.summary: Wabi, a startup from the founder of Replika, has just raised a $20 million pre-seed round.  Wabi is like "YouTube for apps" — a social platform where anyone can use prompts to instantly create mini ap.
articles.content: Wabi, a startup from the founder of Replika, has just raised a $20 million pre-seed round. Wabi is like "YouTube for apps" — a social platform where anyone can use prompts to instantly create mini apps and share them with friends.
articles.author: Ivan Mehta, Rebecca Bellan

articles.title: Google makes it easier to access AI Mode in Chrome on iOS and Android
articles.summary: Users will now be able to access AI Mode via a new dedicated shortcut button under the search bar when opening a "New Tab" page in Chrome.
articles.content: Users will now be able to access AI Mode via a new dedicated shortcut button under the search bar when opening a "New Tab" page in Chrome.

articles.title: Microsoft built a fake marketplace to test AI agents — they failed in surprising ways

articles.title: This startup’s metal stacks could help solve AI’s massive heat problem
articles.summary: Alloy Enterprises has developed a new additive manufacturing technique that can improve liquid cooling performance while bringing it to new parts of the server rack.
